sourcesContent:
import React, { useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import swal from 'sweetalert'; import { Table,Checkbox,Button,Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const RequestLog=(props) =>{ const[reqNo,setReq]=useState(null) const[cAddress,setCaddress]=useState(null) const[description,setDes]=useState(null) const[amount,setAmount]=useState(null) const[recipient,setRecp]=useState(null) const[donors,setDonors]=useState(null) const[voters,setVoters]=useState(null) const[completed,setCom]=useState(null) const[Requests,setRequests]=useState([]) const requestInfo=async()=>{ console.log("contract=",props.contract) const info = await props.contract.methods.getRequeststatus().call(); setReq(info[5]) setCaddress(info[3]) setDes(info[2]) setAmount(props.web3.utils.fromWei(info[6])) setCom(info[7]) setVoters(info[0]) setDonors(info[1]) setRecp(info[4]) } const requestAdder=async()=>{ await props.contract.methods.createRequests(description,recipient,props.web3.utils.toWei(amount)).send({from:props.account[0]}) } const clickHandler=async()=>{ requestAdder(); } useEffect(async()=>{ console.log("useeffect") setRequests([...Requests],[requestInfo]) },reqNo) console.log("amount=",amount) console.log("des=",description) console.log("rec=",recipient) return (

REQUEST CREATION

setDes(e.target.value)}>
setAmount(e.target.value)}>
setRecp(e.target.value)}>

Request Info:

Request_NO Creator Description: Amount: Recipient: Voters/Donors {Requests.map((request,index) => ( {reqNo} {cAddress} {description} {amount} {recipient} {voters}/{donors} ) )}
); } export default RequestLog
